name: Un-Cosmopolitan
preparation:
Adam McDowell’s book Drinks: A User’s Guide offers ways to enjoy a cocktail under less-than-ideal circumstances, calling such a drink an ad-hoctail, including this Un-Cosmopolitan.

Add the vodka and Kool-Aid into a child’s sippy cup with ice.

Close the lid, shake, add a splash of orange soda, and enjoy.
